name: fountain-pen
description: fountain-pen is a simple package to create templates for code generation

scripts.preparePublish: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && rd /s /q .\dist && tsc && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.pubMin: npm run preparePublish && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run preparePublish && npm version patch && git push && npm publish

author: corno
